channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Drake Taps Julia Wolf, Yeat for New Single ‘Dog House’
item.description: 🎶 Drake teams up with Julia Wolf and Yeat for a fire new track ‘Dog House’! 🔥 Who else is hyped? 🐶 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Doechii Announces Fall 2025 North American Tour [Updated]
item.description: 🎉 Let's dance our way into fall with @Doechii's electrifying North American tour! 🕺🎶 #Doechii2025Tour

item.title: Jack White “Enthralled” by Nine Inch Nails’ “Peel It Back” Tour: “The Best Lighting I’ve Ever Seen”
item.description: Jack White is all about that lighting game! 🌟 Who else is ready for the next level of visual perfection? 🔥 #MusicLegendsUnite

item.title: Olivia Rodrigo Teases ‘Live at Glastonbury’ Album With Cure Covers Featuring Robert Smith
item.description: Olivia Rodrigo bringing the 🔥 with Cure covers at Glastonbury! 🎤 Who else is ready for this epic collab? 🎶 #OliviaRodrigo #GlastonburyVibes

item.title: Big Thief Do Magic in New “Words” Video: Watch
item.description: ✨ Dive into the enchanting world of Big Thief's latest "Words" video! 🎶✨ #MusicMagic #BigThief #NewMusicVideo
